text: Nader Afshar Alavinejad (, is a former Iranian football player. He played for the Iran national football team in the 1951 Asian Games and the 1958 Asian Games. He previously played for the Docharkheh Savaran and Taj until 1952. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Nader Afshar Alavinejad at TeamMelli.com Category:Iranian footballers Category:Esteghlal F.C. players Category:Living people Category:Asian Games medalists in football Category:Association football defenders Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Nader Afshar Alavinejad
